definition: tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
orchid (蘭花|兰花 Cymbidium goeringii)/fragrant thoroughwort (蘭草|兰草 Eupatorium fortunei)/lily magnolia (木蘭|木兰)
surname Lan/abbr. for Lanzhou 蘭州|兰州[Lan2 zhou1], Gansu
flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful

sentences.english: We had gathered magnolia seed pods for hand grenades;
sentences.chinese: 我們把木蘭花籽的莢果集攏起來，當手榴彈用。
柔和的玫瑰及木蘭花味道。

sentences.english: Its huge columns were wreathed with laurel and magnolia.
sentences.chinese: 其巨大的立柱爲月桂和木蘭花所環繞。

sentences.english: Chuck norris will attain statehood in2009. his state flower will be the magnolia.
sentences.chinese: 將在2009年得到州的地位，他的州花是木蘭花。

definition: to look after/to take into consideration/to attend to
(of a person) to turn round/to face about/(of a widow) to remarry (archaic)
car or other vehicle (bicycle, truck etc)
to open one's mouth/to start to talk
nutation (plants turning to face the sun)
to turn one's head/to change direction/U-turn/volte face/to repent
to push open (a gate etc)/to push away/to reject/to decline
